children.text: We are given two Java programs to be executed in sequence.
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text: The first program (codeforces_632_B) reads an integer `n`, an array `a` of `n` integers, and a string `s` of length `n`. It then computes an answer and prints it. The second program (codeforces_669_A) reads an integer `n` and prints `(n / 3) * 2 + (n % 3 == 0 ? 0 : 1)`.
children.label: mental_execution

children.text: However, note the sequence: the output of the first program is used as the input to the second program.
children.label: mental_execution

children.text:
